other_tests.findings: Fair-to-poor exercise capacity consistent with deconditioning, left ventricular ejection fraction of 65%, diastolic dysfunction, estimated pulmonary-artery pressure of 45 mm Hg
Sinus rhythm at a rate of 91 beats per minute, with occasional premature ventricular complexes and possible premature atrial complexes with aberrant conduction
Positive immunofluorescence assay for Pneumocystis jirovecii
Positive at 370 pg per milliliter (reference range <60)
Normal coronary arteries, mean pulmonary-capillary wedge pressure of 13 mm Hg, pulmonary-artery pressure of 39/20 mm Hg (mean, 28), no evidence of left-to-right shunting
